name: Pedestrians' right-of-way on sidewalks Stopping and Turning
text: [§291C-79]  Pedestrians' right-of-way on sidewalks.  The driver of a vehicle emerging from or entering an alley, building, private road, or driveway shall yield the right-of-way to any pedestrian approaching on any sidewalk extending across the alley, building entrance, road, or driveway. [L 1971, c 150, pt of §1]
